title: Memory of Many Things (2C88)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a [Sauron] Orc to discard an ally (or 2 [Elven] allies).
Lore:	”'But my memory reaches back even to the Elder Days…. I have seen three ages in the West of the world, and many defeats, and many fruitless victories.'”
Rarity:	C
